item.title: Street lights out, 27th October
item.description:
Street lights out on part of Fairfield Parade (Francis street end) and Langdon Road. It has been a couple of week now and the streets are in complete darkness in the evening.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Langdon Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light is out, 27th October
item.description:
Street light out in Selkirk gardens and the next one along heavily obscured in a tree leaving the road very dark and unsafe if walking at night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on edge of green space/verge will cause muddy ruts and damage to green., 27th October
item.description:
Green space opposite 21 Farriers Reech, Bishops Cleeve. Vehicles parking on green space / verge starting to cause damage now that wet, wintery weather is here. Vehicle in picture also leaks oil on to the road and grass. There is no problem with cars parking legally on the road but these are causing unsightly damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farriers Reach, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 27th October
item.description:
On the 30th September 2025 I struck a pothole. I would like to claim for this repair.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 27th October
item.description:
The possible infected silver birch tree is in the street outside no.38 Clarence Square. There are some large honey-coloured fungal growths at the base of the tree. The tree itself looks quite stressed compared to other silver birch trees in the street after the dry summer.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 27th October
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure please replace x1 rocking 600x600x20mm slab number 2 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet
